title: New runes...How do I...
body:
How do I get my old rune page values I've become accustom to?

+20% CDR
+45.5% critical damage
+40%-ish Attack speed
+6% spell vamp

etc

it doesn't seem like runes were "combined" but rather, they were removed and became masteries only.

replies.body:
You can still get that attack speed easily

You can get a ton more spell vamp than that now

You can only get half that cdr now, but it has a low opportunity cost (other runes in that slot not very strong) and provides an additional benefit as well

Crit damage you are out of luck on. However if you like Crit damage because you like seeing single large hits you can take eyeball colection plus gathering storm and see bigger numbers than ever before.
